description: 10-day luxury Vietnam itinerary for solo traveler, September 10-20, 2024, including Hanoi, Da Nang, and Ho Chi Minh City with stays in top luxury hotels and curated high-end experiences. Budget: $2,000.

activities: Arrive in Hanoi, check in to Sofitel Legend Metropole Hanoi, relax and explore the Old Quarter nearby.
itinerary.notes: Each hotel and resort is selected for luxury experience, spa, and centrality to major sights.

activities: Guided city tour: Hoan Kiem Lake, Temple of Literature, and afternoon tea at the hotel.
itinerary.transportation: Private transfers and luxury car services for each city transfer/tour
itinerary.notes: Private guides and transfers prioritized for comfort.

activities: Day trip to Ha Long Bay with luxury cruise, return in the evening.
itinerary.transportation: Flight: Da Nang to Ho Chi Minh City
itinerary.notes: Day trips include premium options such as luxury cruises and private tours.

activities: Fly to Da Nang, check in to InterContinental Danang Sun Peninsula Resort, beach and spa day.
Private tour of the Marble Mountains and Hoi An Ancient Town, dinner along the river.
Relaxing morning, spa treatment, afternoon at resort pool/beach.
Fly to Ho Chi Minh City, check in to The Reverie Saigon, explore Ben Thanh Market and Dong Khoi street.
Guided tour: War Remnants Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral Basilica, rooftop cocktail at hotel.
Mekong Delta luxury day cruise, return to Ho Chi Minh City by evening.
Free morning for shopping or spa, check out and depart Vietnam.
